QuestData.Title: Drake Hunt
QuestData.Description: I need more drake hatchlings to continue researching the runes covering their bodies.$b$bThey can be found around the northwest edge of the valley....$b$b<Raelorasz pokes his hand with a spear and coats the tip with his blood.>$b$bTake this and use it on one of them. Wait for it to become subdued, then bring it here to me before it expires.
QuestData.LogDescription: Raelorasz wants you to use the Blood-tipped Spear to subdue a Nexus Drake Hatchling and return it to him at the Transitus Shield.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you recovered a drake hatchling for my studies?
QuestData.RewardText: The fate of these young drakes need not burden your conscience, $r. Malygos alone is accountable for this.$b$bI am working ceaselessly to discover the secrets of these runes.$b$bRest assured, we shall take no more lives than we must.
